title: 141: The Quick Palestine Cook: Bold, Easy, Fresh
itunes:title: 141: The Quick Palestine Cook: Bold, Easy, Fresh
itunes:subtitle: Reem Kassis brings us quick and easy weeknight cooking from Palestine; our tip for peeling ginger; we travel to India to try medicinal camel's milk; and J. Kenji Lopez Alt reveals how to cook beans. (Originally aired 10/12/17)
description:
Reem Kassis brings us quick and easy weeknight cooking from Palestine; our tip for peeling ginger; we travel to India to try medicinal camel’s milk; and J. Kenji Lopez Alt reveals how to cook beans. (Originally aired 10/12/17)

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
